mapper.update: update user_tb set enabled = 1 where email = #{email}
mapper.select: select trip_id, user_id, title, start_date, end_date, ko_name as tripDestinationKoName from trip_tb tt left outer join trip_destination_tb tdt on(tdt.trip_destination_id = tt.trip_destination_id) where user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN start_date >= NOW() THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, CASE WHEN start_date >= NOW() THEN start_date ELSE NULL -- ASC 정렬이라 우선순위 없음 END ASC, CASE WHEN start_date < NOW() THEN start_date ELSE NULL END DESC
